item.title: Mexico's 2018 Presidential Elections by State
item.description: Mexicoâ€™s 2018 presidential elections. Two interesting maps that summarize the results. Map 1, percent difference between the front-runner, Andres Manuel (AMLO), and the second place, Ricardo Anaya. In 15 states, AMLO won by more than 40 percentage points.
